title: FIFA World Cup 2014 Brazil total costs
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Breakdown of Projects.
The Costs in million U.S. dollars is highest at Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and lowest at Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects.
The difference of Costs in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Breakdown of Project is 3524.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Breakdown of Project in the x axis and Costs in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

The maximum Costs in million U.S. dollars 3600.0 is found at Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and the minimum is found at Tourism infrastructure projects where Breakdown of Project is 76.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Breakdown of Projects.
The Costs in million U.S. dollars is highest at Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and lowest at Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects.
The difference of Costs in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Breakdown of Project is 3524.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Breakdown of Project in the x axis and Costs in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation has the highest Costs in million U.S. dollars and Tourism infrastructure projects has the lowest Costs in million U.S. dollars.
Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation has 47.37 times more Costs in million U.S. dollars than Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects which is has the lowest.
Costs in million U.S. dollars at Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation is 3600.0 , second place is Urban mobility projects at 3400.0, and thirdly is Upgrades at airports at 2600.0.
The Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation tends to be 2.62 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Breakdown of Projects, we get total 10981.0.
